en_de_code module¶

en_de_code.b64_to_image(base64_string, size)¶

Decode the base64 to uint8 image :param base64_string: The encoded string for the images :type base64_string: string :param size: The size of the image :type size: tuple

Returns

The decoded image

Return type

ndarray

en_de_code.image_to_b64(img)¶

Encode the unit8 image to base64 :param img: The image array, dtype=np.uint8 :type img: ndarray

Returns

The encoded string for the images tuple: The size of the image

Return type

string
